long_description: Upon entering there are a dozen statues standing and kneeling in this room, each creating several shadows across the room as faint light filters in from all corners of the ceiling.  In between the 2 statues in the center are a black tome and a red tome, stood up on it's own on the floor.
short_description: Room covered in shadows and statues, containing a black and red tome.

Black_Tome.name: Black_Tome
Black_Tome.description: This black tome changes something for the hero.

Red_Tome.name: Red_Tome
Red_Tome.description: This red tome presents something to the hero.

Monster.name: Monster
Monster.description: If red tome has been interacted with, these monsters appear and begin to attack you.
